trans-unit.source: Ways to make a temporary Wi-Fi Network
trans-unit.target: Njia za kutengeneza Mtandao wa Wi-Fi wa muda mfupi
Anzisha muunganisho wa Wi-Fi kwenye simu

trans-unit.source: Many mobile phones have a feature called a 'hotspot' that creates a Wi-Fi network. First disconnect from the mobile network (so that there are no data charges). Next, enable the hotspot. Finally, set your laptop and other phones to join that network.
trans-unit.target: Simu nyingi za rununu zina kipengele kinachoitwa 'hotspot' ambacho huunda mtandao wa Wi-Fi. Kwanza katisha muunganisho wa mtandao wa rununu (ili kusiwe na malipo ya data). Kisha, washa hotspot. Mwishowe, weka kompyuta yako ndogo na simu zingine ili kujiunga na mtandao huo.

trans-unit.source: Start a network using your laptop
trans-unit.target: Anza mtandao ukitumia kompyuta yako ndogo

trans-unit.source: Windows 10 laptops can also create local Wi-Fi networks. Do a web search for "windows netsh hostednetwork". If your laptop does not support this, you can get inexpensive USB Wi-Fi adaptors that do. When shopping, make sure the adaptor supports "hosted network".
trans-unit.target: Kompyuta ndogo za Windows 10 zinaweza pia kuunda mitandao ya ndani ya Wi-Fi. Tafuta kwenye wavuti "windows netsh hostednetwork". Ikiwa kompyuta yako ndogo haiwezi kuunga mkono hii, unaweza kupata adapta za bei rahisi za USB ambazo hufanya hivyo. Wakati wa ununuzi, hakikisha adapta inasaidia "mtandao ulioambatanishwa".
